nodes.text: Ride the Raging Rancor was a game that could be played in the Raging Rancor Cantina, a Rancor-themed cantina that was located on Genarius.
Players would have to ride a mechanical Rancor without being thrown off. The only person ever to complete the game to its conclusion was Rrelbocco, the bouncer of the Raging Rancor cantina.
